import sys
t=int(input())
x=sys.stdin.readlines()
l=[]
for s in x:
    s=s.replace(".","")
    s=s.replace("'","")
    s=s.replace(",","")
    s=s.replace(":","")
    s=s.replace(";","")
    lst=[str(i) for i in s.split()]
    for j in lst:
        l.append(j)
m=[]
for y in l:
    z=y.lower()
    m.append(z)
n=[]
for  k in m:
    if(k in n):
        continue
    else:
        n.append(k)
print(len(n))
h=sorted(n)
for j in h:
    print(j)

n= int(input())
s1=''
for _ in range(n):
    s=input()
    s1=s1+s
s1=s1.lower()
s1=s1.replace('.','').replace(',','').replace("'","").replace(':','').replace(';','')
a=set(s1.split())
b=list(a)
b.sort()
print(len(b))
for i in b:
    print(i)

import re

n=int(input())
arr=[]; ans=[]

for i in range(n):
    temp=input().lower().split()
    for j in temp:
        valids=re.sub(r"[^a-z]+", '', j)
        arr.append(valids)

#while('')
while('' in arr):
    arr.remove('')
